short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to send a fax, online or offline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We built Fax Rocket to make it really easy to send out a fax: no hunting for a business center and sending your confidential documents from a public location.

Fax Rocket is for anytime you have to fax a document - whether you are a lawyer sending documents, an office manager mailing files, a contractor sending an invoice, or a doctor's office applying for a license. We'll fax it out for you immediately. You don't even have to leave your desk!

You can just upload the document, enter the recipient address and send it. You can add a cover page if you want, and can send multiple documents at the same time.
